summary:
Sincere, passionate, honest and a change driver, Mohammad is a Project Manager you must have in your business. With over 17+ years’ experience across oil & gas, air cargo and manufacturing industries, Mohammad is a highly versatile techno-functional change facilitator who brings invaluable experience in technology implementation. His projects will focus not on just achieving change but also contribute to the formulation and implementation of the company transformation strategy which is in line with its long term vision. Focused on streamlining and automation, this PMP certified project lead ensures both short term and long term objectives are being met within the Program of works. He has prepared projects budgets totaling up to $11 million, and monitored financial performance versus the budget. His major technical contribution towards IT Transformation and IT Integration (due to acquisition and merger) is commendable, including evaluating sustaining application for migration to Cloud infrastructure. Highly regarded for setting standards for the team, he is often considered as a thought leader and change maker. Always patient, he will also impress you with his communication and negotiation skills to remove roadblocks and manage complex stakeholder network. Humble volunteer to provide services to local community hall and expert level Squash player. 

Experience depth & breadth includes
- Active contributor to the organisation’s Transformation initiative.
-  Worked with vendors like Capgemini, Accenture, Oracle, Gartner, FIS Global (SunGard), Concur Technologies, CommerceOne, KPMG, TCS. 
- Consolidation and Reporting, Procurement, Inventory, Rating, Travel and Expense, Treasury, BI reporting, Approval workflow and other finance applications.
- Supported large scale production environments which includes several hardware components.
- Managed mergers and acquisitions and thereby gaining synergies between business applications.

school.name: Saifee Hall S G J English Public School

projects.title: Expense Report Automation
projects.description:
Technology: Oracle 10g, Tomcat 6.0, IBM-Cognos (BI Tool)

Details:
As an IT Project Manager, the most important responsibility is to make sure the application is available for 24X7. And when it is 80000+ users, creating more than 30k expense claims per month and with integration with multiple systems; the job is very challenging and exciting.
The application is integrated with multiple business systems, some being the source of master data and some being the target application for transaction information.
As an ITPM, the key responsibility also involves maintaining relationships with data center and vendor.

Role: IT Project Manager

Responsibilities:
• Application availability, as per the companies PTI standards
• Evaluation of new SaaS (Software as a Service)  version of vendor offering
• Manage change requests
• Manage small projects of integration changes, analyze impact, and follow proper change management procedures.
• Managing downtime during application or OS patching.
• Perform Risk Assessment procedure (as specified by PMO) on key business changes.
• Involved in vendor contract management.
• Involved in few more business initiatives (more details available on request)

projects.title: Procurement Application
projects.description:
Technology: Oracle 10g, Java, JSP, Tomcat 6.0, JRun 4

Details:
SWPS is SLB’s web-based Procurement application. It is a high visibility; business critical Supply Chain application. Almost everything in SLB is purchased on SWPS. On an average there is around 90k purchase order transactions performed every month. The challenge is to maintain the integration between other business systems such financial system, Logistics Applications and Inventory systems. Transactions are interfaced out of SWPS and also come into SWPS from all the other business systems based on the Business Process defined. During my tenure of 4+ years with SLB on SWPS, I have worked on many sub-projects, including - Disaster Recovery Plan (DR), ERP Application upgrade, Logistics Finance migration, Change Order Process, Market Site integration, External Supplier Integration and Catalog management integration 

Role: IT Business Analysis Systems Analyst

Responsibilities:
• Vendor Management including providing both technical and business knowledge to the 3rd Party off shore vendors based in Mumbai (India)
• Provide monthly reports on SWPS activities to the upper Management
• Worked very closely with the Data Center providing support to Production application and database servers
• Organize Administrators conference calls to discuss issues and new developments on SWPS
• Manage outsourced contractors who are providing L2 and L3 Administration Support to SWPS
• Provide business and technical support to the Level 2 SWPS Administrators
• Manage the Build and patch deployment by Data Canter support team.
• Manage both L3 Support tickets (using BMC Remedy Action Request System) and also L3 development tickets (using Serena Dimensions CM)

projects.title: Next Generation Sky Chain (NGSC)
projects.description:
Technology: Oracle 10g and Java (EJB)

Details:
NGSC is a state-of-the-art cargo management application started design in end 2003 and went live on 8th September 2006. Biggest projects on EJB and the biggest in airline industry. NGSC is designed to service the entire operational and information needs of a cargo-carrying airline. It focuses primarily on the end-to-end processes of the business; automating sales and reservations, rating, transportation, core cargo handling terminal operations, and related management and planning activities. NGSC Pricing (Rating) module fulfils all pricing requirements to work effectively,it needs information about Customers, Airline Published Tariffs, TACT rates, Spot Rates (Ad-hoc rates) Other Charges etc. The functionality to manage and create this data is fully provided within NGSC Pricing module and includes Customer Management, Block space Agreement, Incentives & Airway Bill Rating.

Role: Software Engineer involved in Development and Analysis
Responsibilities:
• Took care of the PL/SQL developments. 
• Have piloted the development for ADHOC and TACT modules for rate computation Engine. 
• Currently independently heading the responsibility of giving support and implementing the CRs for the above two modules. This involves designing process and screens for the new CR.
• Have co-authored the development of TACT data upload and was also involved in the Developments for TARIFF and Other Charges. 
• Independently performing TACT incremental monthly uploads, which involves testing the data and running the application jobs.
• Have developed several interfaces for other systems, requiring services of Sky Chain Rating Engine.
• Was involved in the Load / Performance testing for all Rating Modules. 
• Was involved in Integration of Rating Engine, Called NCRE with the online web based Sky Trade System.

•Managed application integration and synergies post acquisitions and mergers.

Application portfolio includes:

•Quantum & TRAX Payment Solutions (FIS Global/SunGard).

•Oracle Database
•Tomcat 6.0
•IBM-Cognos (BI Tool)
•Serena Dimensions CM
•Complex PRODUCTION and DR environments

profile_positions.title: Business Systems Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Next Generation Sky Chain (NGSC): was one of the largest projects on EJB technology and for the airlines industry that implemented state-of-the-art cargo management application within 3 years. The NGSC application was designed to service the entire operational and information needs of a cargo-carrying airline and focused primarily on the end-to-end processes of the business. NGSC Pricing module fulfilled all pricing requirements including Airline Published Tariffs, TACT rates, Spot Rates (Ad-hoc rates) Other Charges etc.
• Requirement analysis of various modules as well as for development of the same
• Undertook PL/SQL developments of Pricing (TACT and Adhoc)
• Provided application support and implementation of Change Requests 
• Performed multiple test executions including Load/Performance testing as well as integration of modules with the web based system
• Lead support, data management, uploads and implementation
• Integration of Rating Engine, Called NCRE with the online web based Sky Trade System

Oracle
PL/SQL

profile_positions.title: Software Engineer - Next Generation Sky Chain, Air Cargo pricing application

profile_positions.description:
Integrated Management System (IMS): 
The project scope included development of a solution to fully integrate modules like, Purchase & Procurement, Production and Planning, Stores and Inventory and Sales and Dispatch. The project also delivered operational and MIS reports.
• Participated in multiple projects (Client/Server & Web based) for solution development based on Oracle technologies, involving business requirements analysis (ongoing manual process), functional/technical specifications, design (database & work flow) & development, testing & integration and deployment & support
• Prepared the prototypes of the proposed computerized system and with the approval and inputs from the management

Company Website: 
The site is showcasing the company’s product range and production facility. It has web features as guest-book; email the links and some enquiry forms. The site is developed using the modular technique and reusable codes (includes). It had online database driven radiator catalogue and fins details. 
• Independently designed, developed and hosted the website
• Designed the complete layout, edited the photos using Adobe Photoshop etc.

Product Costing Tool: 
The tool catered to the needs of product manufacturing cost for Sales and Production department. Tool would dynamically calculate the weight and cost of the Radiators and it also provided storing and printing feature. It was later on merged with the above Integrated Management System.
• Designed and developed the tool
• Simple design for novice users
• Implemented and provided user training

Application Technology:
• VB 6.0
• .NET
• PL/SQL
• Crystal Reports 
• ORACLE 9i
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Client | La Opala RG Ltd.
Integrated Accounting system | Project Lead| Sep 01 – Jul 02
The project was developed as a web-enabled Integrated Accounting System and was divided into Purchase & Stores, Sales and Financial accounting modules. 
• Project leader for Financial Accounting module and lead a team of four to develop the whole module. 
• The project was developed taking utmost care regarding the database integrity and version control.
• Developed the basic search feature and connection beans.
• Was involved as an assistant to the DBA for designing and maintaining the Oracle database.

Gramophone Company Of India Ltd.
Payroll System | Programmer | Jun 01- Sep 01
The system was designed to maintain the database of different types of workers and their designation, their current posting and vacancies. The system also generated offers for the clients and generated different analysis reports, generated wage slip for the workers, loan details taken by them etc. 
• Involved in writing triggers, store procedures and functions required and design forms layouts, Design & Development of the system, Coding and Testing

Medicare Services India Ltd.
www.msil.org | Technical Project Leader | March 2001- May 2001
The project was to develop a website for the members of the insurance company process their medical claims. 
• Responsible for developing Java beans to facilitate faster access of the site and act as a technical head to the development group, uploading and maintaining the Web Server.

Hindustan Cables Ltd.
Integrated Accounting System | Module Leader | Oct 00 – Feb 01
The project was in the second phase of designing a complete ERP. It had all the modules like Purchase, Sales, Finance, Production, and HR. HCL is a semi government organisation and is into manufacturing cables of different category and components.
Designing and deciding the technology for developing the system, developed the basic prototype and navigation process..
